item.description: Collection of endpoints for version 2 of the api.

request.description:
Gets an access token and sets it for all requests in the collection.
Following scopes are available:
- https://ad.anybill.de/vendor/store
- https://ad.anybill.de/vendor/category
- https://ad.anybill.de/vendor/bill
